Title: Badlaa
Plot: An Indian mystic whose son died in a chemical plant accident smuggles himself into the United States and takes his revenge on two families in suburban Washington, D.C.
GuestStars: Michael Welch, Jordan Warkol, Deep Roy, Andy Hubbell, Jane Daly, Maura Soden, Christopher Hutson, Calvin Remsberg, Jacob Franchek, Mimi Savage, Winston Story, Tony Adelman, Kiran Rao
